thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 8 of 620
thread.title: Carole Liu

author: Carole Liu
title: Carole Liu
text: Yestyle has massive collection of a variety of products from different companies. I only purchase those with good review and often avoid those with few to no reviews. Tough site to buy clothes, especially dresses. Products often have good deals, coupons and such when on sale. I wish there were more rewards and discounts for those who buy more, like myself. Gold membership is not enough.
